nodes.bodyText: 2.5.0 is still supported. I do not see any reason for removing it since so far there are no features implemented which would not support 2.5.0 / 2.5.1.

nodes.bodyText: it confuses me because in the upgrade doc we have a lower Kafka version as 2.6 so people coming from 2.5.x could be confused as well? So if I want to go from 2.5.x to 2.7.0 I should read about it in the doc?

nodes.bodyText: If the upgrade docs talk about upgrade from 2.5 then the users upgrading from 2.6 will be confused. I think using the latest supported Kafka from previous version makes more sense in this context.
